title: Technology-Based Social Learning Environment Design Applying Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social concept comprehension, experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Emphasizes analyzing social phenomena and enhancing workplace application skills for professionals, with flexible learning environments enabled by personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three types of cognitive load theory (intrinsic, extraneous, germane) through the analysis of actual learning cases.
Learners can apply cognitive load minimization strategies (e.g., incremental information delivery, multimedia integration) when designing social issue analysis activities in an LMS environment.
Learners can diagnose cognitive load and propose improvement plans for peers' learning designs through peer evaluation.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
